goal: Implement the maid_list_manifests MCP tool to wrap MAID Runner's manifests command and expose it via the Model Context Protocol
description: Create the manifests.py module that implements the maid_list_manifests tool. This tool wraps the MAID Runner CLI manifests command, handles async execution, captures stdout/stderr, parses manifest listing results categorized by reference type (created, edited, read), and returns structured JSON responses compatible with MCP clients.

contains.name: maid_list_manifests
contains.description: MCP tool that lists all manifests referencing a given file, categorized by reference type
